meanings.definition: The process of making something real or concrete.
meanings.sent1: The actualization of his dream to become a pilot brought him great joy.
meanings.sent2: The actualization of the blueprint into a physical building was a significant achievement.
meanings.sent3: The actualization of the plan to have a surprise party for her friend was a success.
meanings.sent4: The actualization of the idea into a successful business was a testament to his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The actualization of the painting made it come alive with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The realization or fulfillment of potential.
meanings.sent1: Her actualization as a talented artist was evident in her latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The actualization of his potential as a leader was recognized by his peers.
meanings.sent3: The actualization of her dream to travel the world was a source of inspiration for many.
meanings.sent4: The actualization of his musical talent brought joy to all who heard him play.
meanings.sent5: The actualization of their teamwork led to a successful project completion.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something into existence or making it happen.
meanings.sent1: The actualization of the new product launch required careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The actualization of the event was a result of the team's hard work.
meanings.sent3: The actualization of the surprise party caught her completely off guard.
meanings.sent4: The actualization of the plan to renovate the house brought new life to the old space.
meanings.sent5: The actualization of the idea into a successful project was a collaborative effort.
